name: To The Light (itch) (tfwa.games)
description:
Go and save your loved one from the darkness. Fight your way against agents of darkness. 

Lead the way and support your loved one to the light together! 

Sword of Faith and Shield of Hope will help both of you through your journey. 

Though perilous and relentless, you will have a satisfying (and a twist) ending.

Web-version has 3 levels, downloaded version (Windows, Linux, Mac) has 7 levels.

Control both of you and your loved one simultaneously either with a keyboard or a gamepad controller.

Keyboard: A,W,S,D + arrow keys, Enter (select) , P (pause)

Gamepad controller: Left + Right Joystick, A (select), Start (pause)

Note: This game is made in 10 days as a submission for GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022

Game assets : 

https://opengameart.org/content/dungeon-crawl-32x32-tiles-supplemental
